Title: Dor
Writer: Nagesh Kukunoor (screenplay), Nagesh Kukunoor (story), Mir Ali Husain (story), T.A. Razak
Actors: Ayesha Takia, Shreyas Talpade, Gul Panag, Girish Karnad
Plot: Two woman --different backgrounds, miles apart, and strangers to each other-- are linked by tragedy. Their new-found friendship is tested as one holds the fate of the other's husband in her hands.
